'''Arachanda''' is a quest-exclusive [[NPC]] located in [[Sumeru]]. It is part of the [[Aranara]].

Arachanda will appear at different parts of the map in [[Sumeru]] and can be interacted with to start various puzzles which count for the achievement [[Please Play Safely]]. Once the puzzles have been completed, it is not possible to interact with Arachanda again.

==Dialogue==
===Ashavan Realm===
{{Dialogue Start}}
;(Talk to Arachanda)
:'''Arachanda:''' Impressive Nara, let's "have a competition?" But not with Arachanda, it's a competition with what Arachanda has prepared...
:{{DIcon}} Okay, I got this!
::'''Arachanda:''' Arachanda is gonna see what Nara can do. Nara should remember to {{color|buzzword|break the stone piles first, and then the chests}}!
:{{DIcon}} I have something else to do.
::'''Arachanda:''' Okay. There are other important matters.

;(After failing the challenge)
:'''Arachanda:''' Aw... What a pity! Dear Nara friend, you got the order wrong, need to do the challenge again.

;(After completing the challenge)
:'''Arachanda:''' Arachanda is very impressed! Um, wait, Arachanda is grateful. This is for Nara!
;(A common chest appears)

;(Talk to Arachanda after completing the challenge)
:'''Arachanda:''' Nara friend is impressive indeed. Arachanda should try hard to catch up.
{{Dialogue End}}

===Ardravi Valley===
{{Dialogue Start}}
;(Talk to Arachanda)
:'''Arachanda:''' Arachanda wants to see what Nara friend can do. Is {{MC|m=he|f=she}} "worthy of the reputation"?
:{{DIcon}} Okay, I'll show you.
::'''Arachanda:''' Yes! Nara should tread carefully on the dangerous melons. {{color|buzzword|First the Dendro ones, then the ordinary ones}}! Let's start now!
:{{DIcon}} I have something else to do.
::'''Arachanda:''' Okay. There are other important matters.

;(After failing the challenge)
:'''Arachanda:''' Aw... What a pity! Dear Nara friend, you got the order wrong, need to do the challenge again.

;(After completing the challenge)
:'''Arachanda:''' Arachanda is very impressed! Um, wait, Arachanda is grateful. This is for Nara!
;(A common chest appears)

;(Talk to Arachanda after completing the challenge)
:'''Arachanda:''' Is one Arachanda... or ten Arachandas on par with Nara?
{{Dialogue End}}

===Vanarana===
{{Dialogue Start}}
;(Talk to Arachanda)
:'''Arachanda:''' Golden Nara is good without Ararakalari? Arachanda wants to see it!
:{{DIcon}} Of course! Watch this!
::'''Arachanda:''' Great! Golden Nara is gonna "strut his stuff!" Nara should remember to {{color|buzzword|break the tall jar first, and then the short one}}!
:{{DIcon}} I have something else to do.
::'''Arachanda:''' Okay. There are other important matters.

;(After failing the challenge)
:'''Arachanda:''' Aw... What a pity! Dear Nara friend, you got the order wrong, need to do the challenge again.

;(After completing the challenge)
:'''Arachanda:''' Arachanda is very impressed! Um, wait, Arachanda is grateful. This is for Nara!
;(A common chest appears)

;(Talk to Arachanda after completing the challenge)
:'''Arachanda:''' Would Nara become even better once Nara learns Ararakalari... Uhh...
{{Dialogue End}}
